actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to correct a land ownership error within the boundary of Rocky Mountain National Park, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rocky Mountain National Park Ownership Correction Act

summary.text:
Rocky Mountain National Park Ownership Correction Act

This bill directs the Department of the Interior to convey specified federal land to the owner of specified nonfederal land if the owner of the nonfederal land offers to exchange the land.

The values of the federal and nonfederal land to be exchanged shall be considered to be of equal value.

The nonfederal land that is acquired by Interior shall be administered as part of Rocky Mountain National Park in Colorado.

titles.title: Rocky Mountain National Park Ownership Correction Act
Rocky Mountain National Park Ownership Correction Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to correct a land ownership error within the boundary of Rocky Mountain National Park, and for other purposes.
